description: Discover the intersection of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) and intellectual property (IP) law. This article covers the challenges and opportunities NFT creators, buyers, and legal professionals face in navigating copyrights, trademarks, and patents. Explore strategies like licensing agreements and IP monitoring to protect your digital assets in the evolving NFT landscape.
keywords: NFTs, intellectual property, IP law, digital ownership, copyrights, trademarks, patents, legal frameworks, licensing agreements, IP protection, digital assets
title: Navigating Intellectual Property in the NFT Era
